data.name: WhileYouWereAway
data.value: While you were away, your workers earned:

data.name: TutorialWelcomeDesc
data.value: Build your craftsman empire from scratch! Let's show you how it works.

data.name: TutorialWorkshopsDesc
data.value: These are your workshops. Tap on one to see details and upgrades.

data.name: TutorialOrdersDesc
data.value: Accept orders to earn money and XP. Each order has mini-games to complete.

data.name: TutorialMiniGameDesc
data.value: Complete mini-games to finish orders. Aim for Perfect ratings for bonus rewards!

data.name: TutorialUpgradeDesc
data.value: Upgrade your workshops to increase income. The â†‘ button shows the upgrade cost.

data.value: Hire workers to earn money automatically - even while you're away!

data.value: Visit the shop for boosts and bonuses. You can also go ad-free with Premium!

data.name: Story_Ch01_Text
data.value: I'm Master Hans! 40 years of experience, and I've seen it all. Well, almost â€“ I've never seen an apprentice as motivated as you! Your carpentry is small but mighty. Upgrade it, and we'll talk more!

data.name: Story_Ch02_Text
data.value: Phone's ringing? That's a customer! Orders involve mini-games â€“ sawing, laying pipes, wiring. The better you perform, the more money and XP you earn. So: get to work!

data.name: Story_Ch03_Text
data.value: You can't do this alone forever, apprentice. The job market has skilled workers â€“ each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Hire some and they'll earn money while you drink coffee! Well, almost...

data.name: Story_Ch04_Text
data.value: See those golden screws? They're rare and valuable! You get them from mini-games, challenges, and achievements. Use them to hire premium workers and buy special boosts. Guard them with your life!

data.name: Story_Ch05_Text
data.value: Now it gets serious! The research tree unlocks powerful upgrades â€“ better tools, efficient management, stronger marketing. And buildings give permanent bonuses. A canteen, for example, keeps your workers happy!

data.name: Story_Ch06_Text
data.value: Water's flowing! Plumbing is a gold mine, trust me. Everyone needs a plumber â€“ especially at 3 AM when a pipe bursts! The orders are lucrative and the mini-games are fun even for me.

data.name: Story_Ch07_Text
data.value: The tier system for workers matters: F-tier workers are cheap, but... well, they sometimes mix up hammers and screwdrivers. Save up for better tiers â€“ an A-tier worker earns ten times more!

data.name: Story_Ch08_Text
data.value: The electrical shop â€“ my favorite! Wiring is art, not just craft. One wrong wire and... *poof*! But don't worry, everything's well insulated here. Electrical work brings in great money!

data.name: Story_Ch09_Text
data.value: Check this out, journeyman â€“ every day there are three new challenges! Complete orders, play mini-games, earn money. The rewards are worth it, especially the golden screws. A true craftsman works every day!

data.name: Story_Ch10_Text
data.value: Painting brings color to your empire! A good painter has an eye for color â€“ and patience. In the painting mini-game, you need to hit the right sequence. My tip: watch for the flashing tiles, journeyman!

data.name: Story_Ch11_Text
data.value: You've discovered master tools! These ancient artifacts carry the power of past master craftsmen. Each gives a permanent income bonus. Collect all 12 and you'll receive the Master Crown â€“ the most powerful tool of all!

data.name: Story_Ch12_Text
data.value: Roofing â€“ not for those afraid of heights! But the margins are fantastic. And between us: soon you'll reach a level where something special awaits. 'Prestige' we call it. But more on that later...

data.name: Story_Ch13_Text
data.value: Five workshops and 50 orders â€“ you're no apprentice anymore, journeyman! Contracting is the next step: building walls, operating cranes, constructing entire houses. This is the Champions League of craftsmanship!

data.name: Story_Ch14_Text
data.value: Six workshops! People already call your district the 'Craftsman's Quarter'. Your workers whistle happily on their way to work â€“ well, most of them anyway. Keep their spirits high and business will thrive!

data.name: Story_Ch15_Text
data.value: 75 orders â€“ your reputation precedes you! Reputation determines how much customers are willing to pay. Good work = good reviews = more money. Bad work... well, we don't talk about that. Just keep it up!

data.name: Story_Ch16_Text
data.value: Journeyman, I need to talk to you about Prestige. It sounds crazy: give up everything and start over. But trust me â€“ with permanent bonuses, you'll grow twice as fast the second time. I did it three times myself. Think about it...

data.name: Story_Ch17_Text
data.value: 100 orders and Level 250 â€“ you've mastered everything this life has to offer. The Prestige door stands open. Walk through and come back stronger. I'll be waiting for you, journeyman. No, I'll be waiting for you... Master!

data.name: Story_Ch18_Title
data.value: Like a Phoenix from the Ashes!

data.name: Story_Ch18_Text
data.value: You did it, Master! A fresh start â€“ but this time with experience and permanent bonuses. Everything feels familiar, but you're faster, stronger, wiser. That's the secret of true masters: fall down and get back up!

data.name: Story_Ch19_Text
data.value: A new workshop type, Master! The architecture office â€“ where dreams become blueprints. Drawing floor plans, designing houses, realizing visions. This is craftsmanship at its finest. I'm... *sniff*... so proud of you!

data.name: Story_Ch20_Text
data.value: Started over four times â€“ and better each time! You've reached Silver Prestige, Master. Very few achieve that. Your empire now grows at a speed that even impresses me. And I'm not easily impressed!

data.name: Story_Ch21_Text
data.value: The final workshop type: General Contractor! You now coordinate EVERYTHING â€“ from the smallest screw to the largest crane. No project is too big for you. You're no longer just a craftsman, you're an institution!

data.name: Story_Ch22_Text
data.value: I... I'm speechless, Grand Master. 13 Prestige runs. GOLD. In 40 years of craftsmanship, I've never seen anything like it. Your name will be written in the Guild Chronicle. Next to mine, of course â€“ I trained you after all!

data.name: Story_Ch23_Text
data.value: Level 500 and seven workshops at their peak â€“ you're a living legend! The Chamber of Crafts called, they want to hang your portrait. Right next to mine. Well, maybe even ABOVE mine. You've earned it.

data.name: Story_Ch24_Text
data.value: Eight workshops, 500 orders, everything maxed out. Your empire spans the entire city! The next generation of craftsmen looks up to you. You know what? I think the student has surpassed the master. And I don't say that lightly!

data.name: Story_Ch25_Title
data.value: Grand Master of the Craftsman's Guild!

data.name: Story_Ch25_Text
data.value: Level 1000. Grand Master of the Craftsman's Guild. There is no higher title. From a nervous apprentice with a tiny carpentry to the most powerful craftsman in history â€“ YOUR story! I've grown old with you, Grand Master. But it was worth every minute. Thank you.

data.name: TutorialSawingText
data.value: Tap the screen to stop the marker in the green zone! The closer to the center, the better your rating.

data.name: TutorialPipePuzzleText
data.value: Rotate the pipe segments to connect the water flow from start to end. Tap a pipe to rotate it.

data.name: TutorialWiringGameText
data.value: Connect the wires by tapping a left wire, then the matching right wire. Match all wire colors to complete the task.

data.name: TutorialPaintingGameText
data.value: Swipe over the highlighted wall areas to paint them. Avoid painting outside the marked zones. Build combos for bonus points!

data.name: TutorialRoofTilingText
data.value: Place roof tiles to match the color pattern. Gold-bordered tiles show the correct colors â€” use them as reference. Select a color from the palette, then tap empty positions.

data.name: TutorialBlueprintText
data.value: Memorize the order of construction steps, then tap them in the correct sequence. Watch carefully during the preview phase!

data.name: TutorialDesignPuzzleText
data.value: Place the rooms in the correct positions on the floor plan. Select a room card, then tap the matching slot in the grid.

data.name: TutorialInspectionText
data.value: Find all defects on the construction site! Tap on suspicious elements to inspect them. Avoid false alarms.

data.name: MarketRestricted
data.value: Worker Strike: Only tiers up to C available!

data.name: ResearchDoneNotif
data.value: Research complete! Come collect your results.

data.name: DeliveryWaitingNotif
data.value: A supplier is waiting with a delivery!

data.name: RushAvailableNotif
data.value: Rush hour is available! Double your income now.

data.name: DailyRewardNotif
data.value: Your daily reward is waiting! Don't miss it.

data.name: LeaderboardSignIn
data.value: Sign in to Play Games to see leaderboards.

data.name: CloudSaveDesc
data.value: Sync your progress across devices via Google Play Games.

data.name: CloudSaveNewer
data.value: A newer cloud save was found (Level {0}). Use cloud save?

data.name: CloudSyncFailed
data.value: Cloud sync failed. Your local save is still safe.

data.name: WelcomeBackStandard
data.value: We missed you! Here's a small welcome gift.

data.name: WelcomeBackPremium
data.value: It's been a while! Here's a special bonus for you.

data.name: StarterPackDescription
data.value: A little boost to get you started!

data.name: TutorialPlaningText
data.value: Tap when the marker is in the green zone. The more precise, the better!

data.name: TutorialTileLayingText
data.value: Tap when the marker is in the green zone. The more precise, the better!

data.name: TutorialMeasuringText
data.value: Tap when the marker is in the green zone. The more precise, the better!
